title: Experiences | Omanosaura
twoProducts: Omanosaura provides two types of experiences, use the following as a legend:
tripExplanation: Learn about the culture and enjoy the landscapes in Oman
adventureExplanation: Exciting experiences such as visitng valleys, swimming in deep pools, abseiling and climb
failedPurchase: oh no! there was a problem purchasing the experience
failedReview: oops! we couldn't add your review. Maybe you haven't been on this experience yet?
successfulReview: YAY! thanks for your review, it will help fellow adventurers!
explainGreen: Green highlighted Dates are shared dates, prices will be cheaper but you will be paired with another group
payExtra: Pay {{ price }} per person, and we will take care of lunch and snacks
failedAdd: Failed to add a new experience...
